title: PSA: Patch 8.18 will be the Worlds patch

replies.body: Come on, hard buff Morde. Who doesnt want a worlds 2015 redux?
{{champion:42}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:115}} {{item:3070}}
Wut is Worlds?
The biggest LoL tournament of the year
Back when they involved strategy and as such were fun to watch?

really really really big patch like world size patch :)
say something for ur champion to them,chancr always exist if wish isnt to high
They better rebuff Tahm post 8.18 then. >:(
ahahahhahah
{{champion:266}} Pls mercy

they r going to buff him
atlea{{champion:222}} st according to PBE

I think that ekko should be buffed because now i don´t see very players playing ekko. His kit is nice but sometimes is hard to land his w so use ult to stun enemies is a good option but u lose the ult damage. As far as im concerned was really good if his ult dealt damage when he stuns enemies with it. It would provide a safer way to play ekko.

{{sticker:poppy-wink}} {{sticker:poppy-wink}} {{sticker:poppy-wink}} {{sticker:poppy-wink}}  (●BAFF POPPY●)  {{sticker:poppy-wink}} {{sticker:poppy-wink}} {{sticker:poppy-wink}} {{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Gonna expect some random-ass {{champion:64}} buffs as usual.
They already tried. Everyone freaked out and they canceled it lol
I play {{champion:240}} and they wont fix or touch him for over a year. Unless they get an OP strat from him (They wont believe me) then my main is fine :P
*fears in Ryze* Riot is gonna nerf him again probably becausd of the 80 people at LCS smh.

RIOTTERSSS give Olaf finally some great buffs to not fall that hard in late game,give him magic damage on q so u will force opponet to run resist then he wouldnt reach a lot armor and that makes him squishier to olaf r bcs he buuld resist too instead of armor and armor

LC**$**

OMEGALUL
If Gnar gets another freaking nerf out of nowhere for the umpteenth time I am never touching top lane again.

What I want: 

No buffs to {{champion:64}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:157}} (Yasuo because I dont want him to be permabanned for Ucal and Lee and Nida because Score is bad on them)

No nerfs to {{champion:163}} {{champion:79}}  {{champion:203}}  {{champion:113}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:85}} (KT still plays succesfully Tali mid, Grag/Sej/Kindred are the best Score champs and Smeb on those ranged toplaners is just disgusting)

Nerfs for {{champion:142}} {{champion:36}} (Zoe is probably the worst champ for Ucal, it would be helpful if she isn't meta and Smeb does not shine specially on Mundo)

For the botlane I dont care at all because Mata and Alpaca are almost on the same lvl at all champs and they even adapted good to things like Morde bot or Swain.

And that's all, this should help KT Rolster to win Worlds, thank you Rito have a nice day and please follow the scipt.
don't worry, no matter what'll be in meta KT will find a way to get stuck in groups like TSM
